description: Surrounded by palms and lava formations, testing a turquoise tide pool, Falcon Exclusive Brad Patton discovers a wooden idol buoyed by the swelling tide.  As he eyes the intricate carving, chiseled Falcon man Lane Fuller appears and begins to explore the contours of Brad's muscled form. Brad pulls him closer.  As their hunger swells, Brad and Lane surrender to the coursing current of desire and dive into the swirling eddy of erotic abandon, spiraling toward sexual release.
title: Drenched, Part 1:  Soaking It In
